node.excerpt: Overview Hello! I am Esmond who is responsible for operating recommendation server in CLASS101. Recently, we analyzed a similarity between classes using TF-IDF (Term Frequency – Inverse Document Frequency) and uploaded it as a form of API. Over two contents, I will write about the process of develo…

frontmatter.title: Class similarity analysis and construction of Recommendation server using TF-IDF [Part 1]
